alert.note: Alert for Buchanan (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 08 at 8:18PM CDT until July 10 at 1:21AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri... Platte River near Agency affecting Buchanan County. This product along with additional weather and stream information is available at www.weather.gov/kc/. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Platte River near Agency. * WHEN...Until early Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Low-lying areas east of Agency begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CDT Friday the stage was 22.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling to 7.3 feet Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Obs Forecasts Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sat Sun 1am 1pm 1am Platte River Agency 20.0 22.5 Fri 7pm 20.2 15.1 14.0 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
